Description: Composite widget of a text input with a list of selectable options. Typically a text field that controls a listbox, tree, or dialog.
Popup list of choices or commands. Used in conjunction with “menuitem” and “group” roles.
Presentation of a menu typically as a horizontal list of items.
Container for a group of “tab” elements.
A hierarchical list of expandable/collapsible “treeitem” elements.
A grid with expandable/collapsible rows and columns.
